H0.text: What fictional creatures eat 7 meals a day, including second breakfast and elevenses. Hobbits

H1.text: What fictional creatures eat 7 meals a day, including second breakfast and elevenses. Leprechauns

H2.text: What fictional creatures eat 7 meals a day, including second breakfast and elevenses. Dwarves

H3.text: What fictional creatures eat 7 meals a day, including second breakfast and elevenses. Stoor

A4.text: They would enjoy six meals a day, if they could get them.
